TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersistChildrenAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PersistChildrenAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PersistChildrenAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义一个特性，该特性由 ASP.NET 服务器控件用于指示在设计时服务器控件中包含的嵌套内容是与控件对应，还是与服务器控件的属性对应。

span.span: Defines an attribute that is used by ASP.NET server controls to indicate at design time whether nested content that is contained within a server control corresponds to controls or to properties of the server control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与结合使用， 以确定如何解释控件的嵌套内容。The is used in combination with the to determine how nested content of a control is interpreted. 如果 为 `true` 且 为 `false` ，则 ASP.NET 服务器控件中包含的嵌套内容将作为控件保存。If is `true` and is `false`, the nested content contained within an ASP.NET server control is persisted as controls. 如果 为 `false` ，并且为 `true` ，则将嵌套内容作为服务器控件的属性保存。If is `false` and is `true`, the nested content is persisted as properties of the server control. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅 [特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 本节中的代码示例包含两个部分。The code example in this section contains two parts. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置自定义控件的元数据，以便在设计时将其嵌套内容作为控件的属性保持。The first code example demonstrates how to set the metadata of a custom control so that at design time, its nested content is persisted as properties of the control. 第二个代码示例演示如何在 ASP.NET 页中使用类。The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page. 下面的代码示例演示如何应用特性， 以便不会将任何自定义服务器控件的嵌套控件作为嵌套控件保存。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute so that none of a custom server control's nested controls are persisted as nested controls. 名为的自定义服务器控件 `CollectionPropertyControl` 的 特性设置为， `false` 因此 `Employee` 添加的对象将作为嵌套元素保存。The custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl` has the attribute set to `false` so that the `Employee` objects that are added are persisted as nested elements. [!code-csharp[PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample/CS/persistchildren_1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample/VB/persistchildren_1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何 `CollectionPropertyControl` `Employee` 在 ASP.NET 页中使用和类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page. [!code-aspx-csharp[PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample/CS/persistchildren.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PersistChildrenAttribute_Sample/VB/persistchildren.aspx#3)]

span.span: Indicates the default attribute state.
The field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该字段的默认值 为 `Yes` ，指示在设计时保存嵌套内容。The default value for the field is `Yes`, indicating that nested content is persisted at design time.

Public Shared ReadOnly No As PersistChildrenAttribute

summary.span: 指示在设计时嵌套内容不应作为嵌套控件保留。

span.span: Indicates that nested content should not persist as nested controls at design time.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 调用此字段，服务器控件的内部内容将持久保存为属性，而不是服务器。If the field is called, the inner content of a server control is persisted as properties, not as server.

summary.span: 指示在设计时嵌套内容应作为控件保留。

span.span: Indicates that nested content should persist as controls at design time.
The field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 调用了字段，则嵌套的内容将作为控件保存。If the field is called, nested content is persisted as controls.
